title: Holiday Like James Bond in Europe's Czech Republic with Daily Breakfast and Three-Course Dinner Included
description: Discover the history, culture and beauty of Europe’s Czech Republic, staying in five-star luxury in a beautiful suite at Quisisana Palace - a boutique hotel in the riverside spa town of Karlovy Vary near Prague, where the Bond movie ‘Casino Royale’ was filmed. Your escape includes daily à la carte breakfast and an indulgent three-course dining experience.
